name: Eggscape
description:
Eggscape is a game made for the  Godot Wild Jam #28  by the user "MEGAMICRO".
All art,music and code was written in the period of the game jam by "MEGAMICRO".
After playing the game it would be appreciated if you would comment down on your opinion of the game and what could be improved in the game and thank you.

NOTE: the quit button in the browser version doesn't work properly and causes the start button to crash the game, if this happens please reload the page and if that doesn't work then it is recommended that you download the game and play it.
The game is available on Mac, Linux and Windows.

CONTROLS:  LEFT / A      : move left
                               RIGHT / D : move right
